snippet: Buford, Wyo., which has billed itself as the nation’s smallest town, was auctioned off by its sole resident on Thursday.
abstract: Don Sammons, the sole resident of Buford, Wyo, auctions off the small town because he says he felt his work there was done; the town, which has billed itself as the smallest in the United States, was bought by an anonymous Vietnamese buyer for $900,000.
lead_paragraph: Buford, Wyo., which has billed itself as the nation’s smallest town, was auctioned off by its sole resident on Thursday.

headline.seo: Ready to Move On, Man Auctions His Town
headline.main: Packing Up, Moving On and Selling the Town
headline.print_headline: Packing Up, Moving On And Selling The Town
